node.statement: DEFINITIONS (ADMITTED). P_n = monic real-rooted degree-n polynomials with simple roots. G_p(z) = (1/n)p'(z)/p(z) (Cauchy transform). H_p(lambda_i) = p''(lambda_i)/(2p'(lambda_i)) (discrete Hilbert transform). Phi_n(p) = sum_i H_p(lambda_i)^2 (finite free Fisher information). r = p boxplus_n q via MSS coefficient formula. MSS results: p,q in P_n implies r in P_n; derivative identity r' = n(p^(1) boxplus_{n-1} q^(1)).
